name: reazy-web-config
description: A simple configuration module for your Reazy web application.
author: Kumar Sanket, Himanshu Satija, Sankhadeep Roy

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && babel src --presets babel-preset-es2015 --out-dir dist
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && babel src --presets babel-preset-es2015 --watch --out-dir dist
